title: OXO Compact Dustpan & Brush Set
description: Small messes are no big deal with the OXO Good Grips Compact Dust Pan.  The brush conveniently snaps into the Dust Pan for storage, keeping dirty bristles covered.  The Dust Pan's flat bottom allows it to stand up, making it easy to store on countertops or shelves, but it is also slim enough to fit into a drawer. The soft, comfortable brush handle is angled for quick and easy countertop use.  The Dust Pan features a soft, rubber lip that conforms to surfaces to ensure efficiency.

asset.title: OXO Compact Dustpan & Brush Set

Small messes are no big deal with the OXO Good Grips Compact Dust Pan.  The brush conveniently snaps into the Dust Pan for storage, keeping dirty bristles covered.  The Dust Pan's flat bottom allows it to stand up, making it easy to store on countertops or shelves, but it is also slim enough to fit into a drawer. The soft, comfortable brush handle is angled for quick and easy countertop use.  The Dust Pan features a soft, rubber lip that conforms to surfaces to ensure efficiency.
asset.author: OXO

transcripts: Have you ever dropped a handful of Cheerios, spilled a little bit of coffee by the coffee maker, or tipped over a potted plant? The OXO compact dustpan and brush set helps you clean up life's little spills with ease instead of trying to drag a giant dustpan and broom. the compact brush features a soft offset handle that is comfortable to hold while sweeping and is angled for easy counter top use. A flexible rubber lip on the pan  helps guide dust and crumbs into and not under the wide mouth of the dustpan. The brush snaps into the dustpan when not in use. It has a flat bottom so it can sit upright and has a slim profile so it fits in a drawer, cabinet or between appliances on your counter top. Here's a good tip, at the OXO office, we use the compact dustpan and brush set near our coffee grinder to clean up coffer grounds between each use.
